Nudist_0.Name: Nudist
Nudist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. {PAWN_pronoun} can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.

Bloodlust_0.Name: Bloodlust
Bloodlust_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. {PAWN_pronoun} is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.

Kind_0.Name: Kind
Kind_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. {PAWN_pronoun} rarely insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} also never judges people by their appearance. {PAWN_possessive} agreeableness also makes {PAWN_objective} more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.

Psychopath_0.Name: Psychopath
Psychopath_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother {PAWN_objective} at all. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} also feels no mood boost from socializing.

Cannibal_0.Name: Cannibal
Cannibal_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, {PAWN_pronoun} tried it... and {PAWN_pronoun} liked it.

Abrasive_0.Name: Abrasive
Abrasive_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} always says exactly what's on {PAWN_possessive} mind, especially if it's bugging {PAWN_objective}. That tends to rub people the wrong way.

TooSmart_0.Name: Too smart
TooSmart_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is too smart for {PAWN_possessive} own good. {PAWN_pronoun} learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.

Brawler_0.Name: Brawler
Brawler_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes to fight up close and personal. {PAWN_possessive} accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but {PAWN_pronoun}'ll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.

Masochist_0.Name: Masochist
Masochist_0.Description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, there's something exciting about getting hurt. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't know why, {PAWN_pronoun}'s just wired differently.

NightOwl_0.Name: Night owl
NightOwl_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

{PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

{PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.

Greedy_0.Name: Greedy
Greedy_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} needs a really impressive bedroom. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss if {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get what {PAWN_pronoun} wants.

Jealous_0.Name: Jealous
Jealous_0.Description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.

Ascetic_0.Name: Ascetic
Ascetic_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. {PAWN_pronoun} will become unhappy if {PAWN_pronoun} has a bedroom that's too impressive. {PAWN_pronoun} also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. {PAWN_pronoun} never judges others by their appearance.

Gay_0.Name: Gay
Gay_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically attracted to people of {PAWN_possessive} own gender.

Bisexual_0.Name: Bisexual
Bisexual_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically attracted to both men and women.

Asexual_0.Name: Asexual
Asexual_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.

AnnoyingVoice_0.Name: Annoying voice
AnnoyingVoice_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and {PAWN_pronoun} tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike {PAWN_objective}.

CreepyBreathing_0.Name: Creepy breathing
CreepyBreathing_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.

Pyromaniac_0.Name: Pyromaniac
Pyromaniac_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves fire. {PAWN_pronoun} will never extinguish fires, and will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. {PAWN_pronoun} will be happy around flames, and happier when wielding an incendiary weapon.

Wimp_0.Name: Wimp
Wimp_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize {PAWN_objective}.

Nimble_0.Name: Nimble
Nimble_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. {PAWN_pronoun} seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.

Nimble_2.Name: Deftly dodger
Nimble_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has cat-like reflexes, and excels at evading attacks.

Nimble_-1.Name: Sluggish
Nimble_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] is not very good at getting out of the way of blows.

FastLearner_0.Name: Fast learner
FastLearner_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a knack for learning. {PAWN_pronoun} picks things up much faster than others.

SlowLearner_0.Name: Slow learner
SlowLearner_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} is slow on the uptake. {PAWN_pronoun} learns much slower than others.

Undergrounder_0.Name: Undergrounder
Undergrounder_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no need to experience the outdoors or light. {PAWN_pronoun} will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever and is not bothered by darkness. However, {PAWN_nameDef} will be unhappy while outdoors.

Transhumanist_0.Name: Body modder
Transhumanist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} feels limited in {PAWN_possessive} feeble human body. {PAWN_pronoun} often dreams of being enhanced with artificial body parts or xenogenetics.

BodyPurist_0.Name: Body purist
BodyPurist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes the human body is limited for a reason. To {PAWN_objective}, artificial body parts and xenogenes are unethical and disgusting.

GreatMemory_0.Name: Great memory
GreatMemory_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a fantastic memory for detail. {PAWN_pronoun} will learn new skills slightly faster than other people.

Tough_0.Name: Tough
Tough_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. {PAWN_pronoun} takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. {PAWN_pronoun} is extremely hard to kill.

TorturedArtist_0.Name: Tortured artist
TorturedArtist_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. {PAWN_pronoun} will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.

Gourmand_0.Name: Gourmand
Gourmand_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s life revolves around food. {PAWN_pronoun} gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.

QuickSleeper_0.Name: Quick sleeper
QuickSleeper_0.Description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether {PAWN_pronoun}'s sleeping on a bed or on the ground, {PAWN_pronoun} will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.

SpeedOffset_-1.Name: Slowpoke
SpeedOffset_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] is always falling behind the group whenever [PAWN_pronoun] goes anywhere.

SpeedOffset_1.Name: Fast walker
SpeedOffset_1.Description: [PAWN_name] likes to be where [PAWN_pronoun]'s going. [PAWN_pronoun] walks quicker than most people.

SpeedOffset_2.Name: Jogger
SpeedOffset_2.Description: [PAWN_name] always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.

DrugDesire_2.Name: Chemical fascination
DrugDesire_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.

DrugDesire_1.Name: Chemical interest
DrugDesire_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.

DrugDesire_-1.Name: Teetotaler
DrugDesire_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. [PAWN_pronoun] strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.

NaturalMood_2.Name: Sanguine
NaturalMood_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is just naturally upbeat about [PAWN_possessive] situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.

NaturalMood_1.Name: Optimist
NaturalMood_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get [PAWN_objective] down.

NaturalMood_-1.Name: Pessimist
NaturalMood_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] tends to look on the bad side of life.

NaturalMood_-2.Name: Depressive
NaturalMood_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] is perenially unhappy. [PAWN_pronoun] has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.

Nerves_2.Name: Iron-willed
Nerves_2.Description: [PAWN_name]'s will is an iron shield. [PAWN_pronoun] keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.

Nerves_1.Name: Steadfast
Nerves_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.

Nerves_-2.Name: Volatile
Nerves_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] is on a hair-trigger all the time. [PAWN_pronoun] is the first to break in any tough situation.

Neurotic_1.Name: Neurotic
Neurotic_1.Description: [PAWN_name] likes to have things squared away. [PAWN_pronoun] will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can get the better of [PAWN_objective].

Neurotic_2.Name: Very neurotic
Neurotic_2.Description: [PAWN_name] feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. [PAWN_pronoun] will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can easily get the better of [PAWN_objective].

Industriousness_2.Name: Industrious
Industriousness_2.Description: [PAWN_name] has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.

Industriousness_1.Name: Hard worker
Industriousness_1.Description: [PAWN_name] is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.

Industriousness_-2.Name: Slothful
Industriousness_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] loves idleness and hates anything productive. [PAWN_pronoun] moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.

PsychicSensitivity_2.Name: Psychically hypersensitive
PsychicSensitivity_2.Description: [PAWN_name]'s mind is like a psychic tuning fork. [PAWN_pronoun] is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.

PsychicSensitivity_1.Name: Psychically sensitive
PsychicSensitivity_1.Description: [PAWN_name]'s mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.

PsychicSensitivity_-1.Name: Psychically dull
PsychicSensitivity_-1.Description: [PAWN_name]'s mind is psychically out of tune with others. [PAWN_pronoun] isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.

PsychicSensitivity_-2.Name: Psychically deaf
PsychicSensitivity_-2.Description: [PAWN_name]'s mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. [PAWN_pronoun] just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.

Beauty_2.Name: Beautiful
Beauty_2.Description: [PAWN_name] is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to [PAWN_objective] before [PAWN_pronoun] even opens [PAWN_possessive] mouth.

Beauty_1.Name: Pretty
Beauty_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like [PAWN_objective].

Beauty_-1.Name: Ugly
Beauty_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.

Beauty_-2.Name: Staggeringly ugly
Beauty_-2.Description: [PAWN_name] is staggeringly ugly. [PAWN_possessive] face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at [PAWN_objective] while conversing.

Immunity_1.Name: Super-immune
Immunity_1.Description: [PAWN_name] has a naturally powerful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.

Immunity_-1.Name: Sickly
Immunity_-1.Description: [PAWN_name] has an awful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.

Delicate_0.Name: Delicate
Delicate_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has fragile skin and bones. {PAWN_pronoun} takes more damage than other people from the same blows.
(Biotech)

Recluse_0.Name: Recluse
Recluse_0.Description:
The fewer people in {PAWN_nameDef}'s faction, the happier {PAWN_pronoun} is. Being alone is best of all.
(Biotech)

PerfectMemory_0.Name: Perfect memory
PerfectMemory_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has outstanding memory, both in terms of retaining information but also muscle memory. {PAWN_possessive} skills will never decay.
(Anomaly)

Occultist_0.Name: Occultist
Occultist_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has deep knowledge of the twisted patterns of dark psychic energy. {PAWN_pronoun} can study unnatural entities faster than others. {PAWN_pronoun} will also periodically teach this inhuman knowledge to others when {PAWN_pronoun} gets the chance.
(Anomaly)

Joyous_0.Name: Joyous
Joyous_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has the ability to make everyone feel better and inspire them to be the best version of themselves.
(Anomaly)

BodyMastery_0.Name: Body mastery
BodyMastery_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} doesn't have basic needs like eating, sleeping, or comfort. {PAWN_possessive} body is driven by some unknown mechanism, which has turned {PAWN_possessive} eyes completely white.
(Anomaly)

Disturbing_0.Name: Disturbing
Disturbing_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is a peculiar person who seems fixated on horrendous ideas. Talking to {PAWN_objective} is often upsetting.
(Anomaly)

VoidFascination_0.Name: Void fascination
VoidFascination_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is strangely intrigued by unnatural entities and is easily enthralled by them.
(Anomaly)

VFEP_WarcasketTrait_0.Name: Warcasket
VFEP_WarcasketTrait_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is entombed in a warcasket. No amount of pain will have an effect on them, and they can never go into a pain shock or drop unconscious due to pain. Because of how bulky the armor is and how much energy it takes to use it, {PAWN_nameDef} is not capable of doing any work.
(Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates)

VFEP_Shellcasket_0.Name: Shellcasket
VFEP_Shellcasket_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} was entombed in a warcasket, and then brutally pulled out of one. The neural and nerve damage from being unplugged is so severe that {PAWN_nameDef} is in constant, agonizing pain and can barely assemble his thoughts. Only installing {PAWN_nameDef} back in a warcasket can cure the symptoms.
(Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates)

AC_Shellwalker_0.Name: Shellwalker
AC_Shellwalker_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} prefers shells over sleeves. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn’t care how often {PAWN_pronoun} switches shells or what shell {PAWN_pronoun} is currently riding, but will be unhappy in a sleeve.
(Altered Carbon 2: ReSleeved)

AC_FreeMind_0.Name: Free mind
AC_FreeMind_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has always seen {PAWN_possessive} body as nothing more than a vessel. {PAWN_pronoun} does not care about the gender, age or looks of {PAWN_possessive} body.
(Altered Carbon 2: ReSleeved)

AC_Sleever_0.Name: Sleever
AC_Sleever_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} can change {PAWN_possessive} sleeves as easily as someone else may change their clothes. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn’t care how often {PAWN_pronoun} switches sleeves or what sleeve {PAWN_pronoun} is currently riding.
(Altered Carbon 2: ReSleeved)

AM_Elite_0.Name: Successful products
AM_Elite_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is a successful product of an ancient experimental project, {PAWN_pronoun} almost entirely specialized for combat. {PAWN_pronoun} is extremely hard to defeat.
(Ancient urban ruins)

AM_MallGuards_0.Name: Fashion guy
AM_MallGuards_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is a fashion guy who is skilled at shooting in a slide shovel, {PAWN_pronoun} can use gun to blast everything he sees.
(Ancient urban ruins)

AM_Slaughter_0.Name: Parasitic failed product
AM_Slaughter_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} was implanted with an excessive amount of parasites, which completely destroyed {PAWN_possessive} sanity but greatly increased {PAWN_possessive} strength.
(Ancient urban ruins)

BadPeople_Evil_0.Name: Depraved
BadPeople_Evil_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} does not feel empathy for strangers. {PAWN_pronoun} can hurt them without feeling bad about it.
(Bad People)

BadPeople_Kinslayer_0.Name: Kinslayer
BadPeople_Kinslayer_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} kills so many relatives. Another dead kin is just a number.
(Bad People)

VPE_Thrall_0.Name: Thrall
VPE_Thrall_0.Description:
Psychic enthrallment caused by incredibly strong mental influence. Thralls don't need to sleep or have recreation, but are unable to do skilled work and engage in social interactions.
(Vanilla Psycasts Expanded)

Hygienic_2.Name: Germaphobe
Hygienic_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] is obsessed with germs and will wash much more frequently than normal.
(Dubs Bad Hygiene)

Hygienic_1.Name: Hygienic
Hygienic_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] is very hygienic and will wash more frequently.
(Dubs Bad Hygiene)

Hygienic_-1.Name: Unhygienic
Hygienic_-1.Description:
[PAWN_name] is very unhygienic and will wash less frequently.
(Dubs Bad Hygiene)

Hygienic_-2.Name: Slob
Hygienic_-2.Description:
[PAWN_name] has very low standards of cleanliness and will only wash when they absolutely have to.
(Dubs Bad Hygiene)

FT_StrongBack_1.Name: Strong back
FT_StrongBack_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a strong back which allows [PAWN_objective] to carry more than most people.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_StrongBack_2.Name: Very strong back
FT_StrongBack_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a very strong back, [PAWN_pronoun] must be part mule or something because [PAWN_pronoun] can carry a lot more than most people.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Packing_-1.Name: Packin' light
FT_Packing_-1.Description:
[PAWN_name] packs lightly. [PAWN_pronoun] will carry less but will move more swiftly.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Packing_1.Name: Pack rat
FT_Packing_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a pack rat, [PAWN_pronoun] will keep just about anything that might be useful later.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Adventuring_1.Name: Traveler
FT_Adventuring_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] is great at traveling. [PAWN_pronoun] moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Adventuring_2.Name: Explorer
FT_Adventuring_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] is great at exploration. [PAWN_pronoun] moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Adventuring_3.Name: Adventurer
FT_Adventuring_3.Description:
[PAWN_name] is great at adventuring. [PAWN_pronoun] moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Bandolier_0.Name: Bandolier
FT_Bandolier_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a bandolier. [PAWN_pronoun] likes to keep extra ammo handy for reloading ranged weapons.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_SturdyFrame_0.Name: Sturdy frame
FT_SturdyFrame_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a sturdy frame. [PAWN_pronoun] can carry more and it takes more to bring [PAWN_objective] down.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_BearArms_0.Name: Bear arms
FT_BearArms_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has bear arms. [PAWN_pronoun] can carry more and [PAWN_possessive] arms pack more of a punch!
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_FrailBack_0.Name: Frail back
FT_FrailBack_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a frail back and won't be able to carry as much as the average person.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Charisma_1.Name: Charismatic
FT_Charisma_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a charismatic personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is good at social interactions and trading.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Charisma_2.Name: Very charismatic
FT_Charisma_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a very charismatic personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at social interactions and trading.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Intimidation_1.Name: Intimidating
FT_Intimidation_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] has an intimidating personality, this gives [PAWN_objective] an advantage in social interactions.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Intimidation_2.Name: Very intimidating
FT_Intimidation_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a very intimidating personality, this gives [PAWN_objective] a large advantage in social interactions.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_AimOffset_-1.Name: Poor aim
FT_AimOffset_-1.Description:
[PAWN_name] has poor hand-eye coordination and will miss [PAWN_possessive] target more often in combat.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_AimOffset_1.Name: Steady aim
FT_AimOffset_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] has good hand-eye coordination and will miss [PAWN_possessive] target less often in combat.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_AimOffset_2.Name: Great aim
FT_AimOffset_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] has great hand-eye coordination and will miss [PAWN_possessive] target less often in combat.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Artisan_0.Name: Artisan
FT_Artisan_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a skilled crafter with artistic finesse, [PAWN_pronoun] enjoys putting things together and [PAWN_pronoun]'s pretty good at it.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_IronStomach_0.Name: Iron stomach
FT_IronStomach_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has an iron stomach. [PAWN_pronoun] can go without eating longer and it takes more to upset [PAWN_possessive] stomach.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Agility_1.Name: Agile
FT_Agility_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] has good reflexes and moves with finesse. [PAWN_pronoun] will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Agility_2.Name: Ninja
FT_Agility_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] has great reflexes and moves like a ninja. [PAWN_pronoun] will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Intelligence_1.Name: Intelligent
FT_Intelligence_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] is more intelligent than average. [PAWN_pronoun] learns faster and has a good understanding of the world around [PAWN_objective].
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Intelligence_2.Name: Very intelligent
FT_Intelligence_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] is very intelligent. [PAWN_pronoun] learns faster and has a great understanding of the world around [PAWN_objective].
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Perception_1.Name: Perceptive
FT_Perception_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] is aware of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings and has a good understanding of how [PAWN_possessive] actions affects others.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Perception_2.Name: Very perceptive
FT_Perception_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] is very aware of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings and has a great understanding of how [PAWN_possessive] actions affects others.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Evasion_1.Name: Dodgy
FT_Evasion_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] is good at doging things. [PAWN_pronoun] is good at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Evasion_2.Name: Evasive
FT_Evasion_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] is great at evading things. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Scientific_1.Name: Scientific
FT_Scientific_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a scientific mind. [PAWN_pronoun] is a good researcher and a fast learner.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Scientific_2.Name: Very scientific
FT_Scientific_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a very scientific mind. [PAWN_pronoun] is a great researcher and a fast learner.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Endurance_1.Name: Enduring
FT_Endurance_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] has good health and an enduring personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is better at handling stressful situations than others.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Endurance_2.Name: Very enduring
FT_Endurance_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] has exceptional health and a very enduring personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is capable of handling high stress situations that others cannot.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Bargaining_1.Name: Bargainer
FT_Bargaining_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] is great at bargaining. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at social interactions and can find great deals while trading.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Bargaining_2.Name: Hard bargainer
FT_Bargaining_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a hard bargainer. [PAWN_pronoun] is adept at social interactions and can find the best deals while trading.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Inspiration_-1.Name: Uninspiring
FT_Inspiration_-1.Description:
[PAWN_name] has an uninspiring personality. [PAWN_pronoun] has less motivation to learn and puts less effort into social interactions.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Inspiration_1.Name: Inspirational
FT_Inspiration_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] has an inspirational personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is good at social interactions and is a motivated learner .
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Inspiration_2.Name: Very inspirational
FT_Inspiration_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a very inspirational personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at social interactions and is a very motivated learner.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Generosity_1.Name: Generous
FT_Generosity_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a generous person, sometimes to a fault. [PAWN_pronoun] is a good negotiator but often does so by offering more than [PAWN_pronoun] should.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Generosity_2.Name: Overly generous
FT_Generosity_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] is an overly generous person to a fault. [PAWN_pronoun] is a great negotiator but often does so by offering more than [PAWN_pronoun] should
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Scrapper_0.Name: Scrapper
FT_Scrapper_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is good at working with scrap metal. [PAWN_pronoun] is great with a smelter and is efficient when using building materials. 
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_NaturalLeader_0.Name: Natural leader
FT_NaturalLeader_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a natural leader, [PAWN_pronoun] is good at social interactions and can handle stressful situations that others might not.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_RadResistant_1.Name: Rad resistant
FT_RadResistant_1.Description:
[PAWN_name]'s body has built up a resistance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_RadResistant_2.Name: Rad tolerant
FT_RadResistant_2.Description:
[PAWN_name]'s body has built up a tolerance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_ActionBoy_0.Name: Action boy
FT_ActionBoy_0.Description:
There's no time to waste! [PAWN_name] has increased movement and work speed.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_ActionGirl_0.Name: Action girl
FT_ActionGirl_0.Description:
There's no time to waste! [PAWN_name] has increased movement and work speed.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_QuickHands_0.Name: Quick hands
FT_QuickHands_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has quick hands. When it comes to [PAWN_possessive] hands, [PAWN_name] never hesitates.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_GunNut_0.Name: Gun nut
FT_GunNut_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a gun nut, [PAWN_pronoun] loves guns so much that [PAWN_pronoun] gets a mood boost while holding a ranged weapon.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Scrounger_0.Name: Scrounger
FT_Scrounger_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] knows how to scavenge and gather for resources quickly, but if you think that's fast wait until you see [PAWN_pronoun] eat!
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Survivalist_0.Name: Survivalist
FT_Survivalist_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is survialist. [PAWN_pronoun] has a natural ability to survive some situations that others might not.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Blitz_0.Name: Blitz
FT_Blitz_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] finds the gap to make the tackle! [PAWN_pronoun] moves quickly and gets the jobs done before anyone can react.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Philanthropist_1.Name: Philanthropist
FT_Philanthropist_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a philanthropist. [PAWN_pronoun] is generally good natured and cares for the welfare of others.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_HealingHands_0.Name: Healing hands
FT_HealingHands_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has healing hands. Whether it's for patching up or food the colony knows they can count on [PAWN_possessive] healing touch.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Rooted_0.Name: Rooted
FT_Rooted_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is part tree! It takes more to bring [PAWN_name] down but also more to get [PAWN_objective] moving.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_LeadBelly_0.Name: Lead belly
FT_LeadBelly_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a lead belly. [PAWN_possessive] belly can go much longer without food and [PAWN_pronoun] is more resistant to toxic radiation.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Serendipitous_0.Name: Serendipitous
FT_Serendipitous_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is serendipitous, [PAWN_pronoun] seems to be a pretty lucky individual and [PAWN_pronoun]'s pretty happy about it too.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_GreenThumb_0.Name: Green thumb
FT_GreenThumb_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a passion for gardening. [PAWN_pronoun] is quick when working with plants and recieves more bountiful yields when harvesting them.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Tenderizer_0.Name: Tenderizer
FT_Tenderizer_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a tenderizer! [PAWN_pronoun] has a passion for beating meat into submission.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_FortuneFinder_0.Name: Fortune finder
FT_FortuneFinder_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] seems to discover hidden wealth where ever [PAWN_pronoun] goes.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_BountifulButcher_0.Name: Bountiful butcher
FT_BountifulButcher_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a bountiful butcher! [PAWN_pronoun] isn't afraid to dig a little deeper to get what [PAWN_pronoun] wants.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_AnimalFriend_0.Name: Animal friend
FT_AnimalFriend_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a passion for animals. [PAWN_pronoun] is adept at animal interactions and will bond with them more often. [PAWN_name] refuses to hunt animals.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Magnetic_0.Name: Magnetic
FT_Magnetic_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a magnetic body, literally! Somehow [PAWN_pronoun] able to use [PAWN_possessive] attractiveness on not just colonists, but metals too!.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_LifeGiver_0.Name: Life giver
FT_LifeGiver_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] embodies wellness! Colonist who need treatment can rest easily knowing they have [PAWN_possessive]'s expertise keeping them alive.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_SpiritualHealer_0.Name: Spiritual healer
FT_SpiritualHealer_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a spiritual healer, [PAWN_pronoun] is a great doctor with good social skills. [PAWN_name] loves to grow and make [PAWN_possessive] own medicine.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Ghoulish_0.Name: Ghoulish
FT_Ghoulish_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is still human, mostly. [PAWN_pronoun] is immune to the effects of toxic fallout and much harder to kill but [PAWN_possessive] ghoulish appearance makes interacting with others difficult.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_IdiotSavant_0.Name: Idiot savant
FT_IdiotSavant_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] isn't stupid! [PAWN_pronoun] is just... different. [PAWN_pronoun] works through tasks slowly but learns extremely quickly. [PAWN_pronoun] is incapable performing intellectual, social or caring tasks.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Stupid_0.Name: Stupid
FT_Stupid_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] isn't very smart. [PAWN_pronoun] can mess up doing just about anything.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Oblivious_0.Name: Oblivious
FT_Oblivious_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] isn't very aware of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings, or anything at all really. [PAWN_pronoun]
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Woodchucker_0.Name: Woodchucker
FT_Woodchucker_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is part woodchuck! [PAWN_pronoun] wants everyone to think [PAWN_possessive] great woodworking skills are because of talent but everybody knows it's really because of those dang teeth.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_WreckingBall_0.Name: Wrecking ball
FT_WreckingBall_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a wrecking ball! [PAWN_pronoun] can push through building material like it's not even there. [PAWN_pronoun] really doesn't know [PAWN_possessive] own strength, often breaking things during construction.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_Perfectionist_0.Name: Perfectionist
FT_Perfectionist_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a perfectionist with a passion for art. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at construction but takes longer to complete tasks because [PAWN_pronoun] puts too much effort into making everything perfect.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

FT_IronFist_0.Name: Iron fist
FT_IronFist_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has an iron fist! [PAWN_pronoun] can punch through foes like they are not even there. [PAWN_name] has a passion for melee combat and dislikes ranged weapons.
(Fallout Traits Continued)

MT_Petty_0.Name: Petty
MT_Petty_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is overtly concerned with social hitches. {PAWN_pronoun} tends to annoy others and can't stand {PAWN_possessive} ex-lovers moving on.
(Moloy Traits (Continued))

MT_Charismatic_0.Name: Charismatic
MT_Charismatic_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has a shining personality. {PAWN_possessive} words can get through to others more than usual.
(Moloy Traits (Continued))

MT_Eccentric_0.Name: Eccentric
MT_Eccentric_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} Acts abnormally, probably due to their oddly high intelligence. {PAWN_pronoun} often makes a larger impact socially... For better or worse. {PAWN_nameDef} is so out of the social loop, {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't realise when {PAWN_pronoun} is being insulted.
(Moloy Traits (Continued))

MT_Conductor_0.Name: Conductor
MT_Conductor_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} leads the movement of others well. Colonists around {PAWN_nameDef} move faster.
(Moloy Traits (Continued))

MT_Commander_0.Name: Commander
MT_Commander_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is an effective leader in ranged combat. Colonists around {PAWN_nameDef} have better aim.
(Moloy Traits (Continued))

MT_Hermit_0.Name: Hermit
MT_Hermit_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} prefers being solitary. {PAWN_pronoun} is better at working with plants anyways.
(Moloy Traits (Continued))

MT_Peppy_0.Name: Peppy
MT_Peppy_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is full of energy. {PAWN_pronoun} will randomly gain the Frenzy Go Inspiration, even if {PAWN_pronoun} is not happy.
(Moloy Traits (Continued))

MT_Volatile_Crafter_0.Name: Volatile Crafter
MT_Volatile_Crafter_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is a genius crafter, and will often have creative inspiration. However, {PAWN_possessive} mind is constantly ticking, making {PAWN_nameDef} much more likely to have a mental break.
(Moloy Traits (Continued))

MT_Luminary_0.Name: Luminary
MT_Luminary_0.Description:
For whatever reason, everyone seems to really care how {PAWN_nameDef} is feeling.
(Moloy Traits (Continued))

MT_Tyrant_0.Name: Tyrannic
MT_Tyrant_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} harshly criticizes and dictates the actions of others. Colonists around {PAWN_nameDef} move and work faster, but receive a mood debuff from the added stress.
(Moloy Traits (Continued))

MT_Venturous_0.Name: Venturous
MT_Venturous_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} loves to take risks and complete quests. {PAWN_pronoun} will recieve mood buffs for successful quests, and debuffs for failed quests.
(Moloy Traits (Continued))

MPT_BladeWhisperer_0.Name: Blade whisperer
MPT_BladeWhisperer_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} knows the spirit of all arms. If {PAWN_pronoun} is not bonded to a weapon already, upon equipping a non-biocodable melee weapon, it will generate a single persona weapon trait and will bond to them. Should {PAWN_nameDef} ever unequip the weapon, it will lose these traits.
(More Persona Traits)

VCEF_Fisherman_0.Name: Fisherman
VCEF_Fisherman_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the solitude and tranquility inherent to long fishing sessions. {PAWN_pronoun} will prefer fishing above other activities.
(Vanilla Fishing Expanded)

SN_anomalyResearcher_0.Name: Rift scholar
SN_anomalyResearcher_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is obsessed with unnatural phenomena, but immersion in the void erodes their grip on the mundane–soon, even "reality" feels like the most fragile fiction of all.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_bandwidth_0.Name: High Bandwidth
SN_bandwidth_0.Description:
[PAWN_name]'s mind seems to be wired differently, making [PAWN_possessive] brain exceptionally receptive to neural implants and mechanical interfaces.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_mech_0.Name: Natural Mechanitor
SN_mech_0.Description:
From the moment [PAWN_name] first laid eyes on a mechanoid, [PAWN_pronoun] felt an instinctive connection. [PAWN_pronoun] seems to understand these machines on a fundamental level, making [PAWN_possessive] interactions with them remarkably efficient.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_Hypermetabolic_0.Name: Hypermetabolic
SN_Hypermetabolic_0.Description:
[PAWN_name]'s body seems to process food and blood with remarkable efficiency. [PAWN_pronoun] can extract more nutrition from raw food and gain more hemogen from blood than most others.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_PrisonGuard_0.Name: Prison guard
SN_PrisonGuard_0.Description:
Years spent working in a maximum security prison have taught [PAWN_name] how to handle even the most unruly prisoners. [PAWN_pronoun] knows exactly how to maintain order and keep people in line.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_Priest_0.Name: Priest
SN_Priest_0.Description:
[PAWN_name]'s faith burns with an unquenchable flame. [PAWN_pronoun] has a remarkable gift for sharing [PAWN_possessive] convictions with others, helping them see the light of [PAWN_possessive] ideology.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_Gifted1_0.Name: Psychic Prodigy
SN_Gifted1_0.Description:
Though [PAWN_name] has barely begun [PAWN_possessive] training, [PAWN_pronoun] already shows an extraordinary talent for psychic abilities. [PAWN_pronoun] recovers from neural heat with remarkable speed, though [PAWN_possessive] capacity remains modest.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_Gifted2_0.Name: Gifted Psychic
SN_Gifted2_0.Description:
Born with an exceptional reservoir of psychic energy, [PAWN_name] can channel immense amounts of neural heat. While [PAWN_pronoun] takes longer to recover, [PAWN_possessive] capacity far exceeds that of most psylinks.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_fasthands_0.Name: Fast hands
SN_fasthands_0.Description:
[PAWN_name]'s fingers seem to dance across [PAWN_possessive] work, completing tasks with remarkable speed and precision.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_crackshot_0.Name: Crack shot
SN_crackshot_0.Description:
With reflexes honed to perfection, [PAWN_name] can acquire and engage targets with astonishing speed. [PAWN_pronoun]'s hand-eye coordination is nothing short of exceptional.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_accurateShooter_0.Name: Marksman
SN_accurateShooter_0.Description:
[PAWN_name]'s aim is legendary. [PAWN_pronoun] can place shots with deadly accuracy, making every bullet count.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_swordsman_0.Name: Swordsman
SN_swordsman_0.Description:
Born to the blade, [PAWN_name] moves with the grace of a dancer in combat. [PAWN_pronoun] finds [PAWN_possessive] true calling in the heat of close-quarters battle.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_foreman_0.Name: Foreman
SN_foreman_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a master builder's eye for detail and efficiency. [PAWN_pronoun] can transform complex blueprints into reality with remarkable skill and precision.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_deepdriller_0.Name: Deep driller
SN_deepdriller_0.Description:
[PAWN_name]'s deep understanding of geology makes [PAWN_pronoun] an exceptional miner. [PAWN_pronoun] knows exactly where to drill and how to extract the most valuable resources.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_Souschef_0.Name: Sous-chef
SN_Souschef_0.Description:
In [PAWN_name]'s hands, ingredients transform into culinary masterpieces. [PAWN_pronoun] approaches cooking with both passion and precision, creating meals that delight the senses.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_pharmacist_0.Name: Pharmacist
SN_pharmacist_0.Description:
[PAWN_name]'s knowledge of chemistry borders on the supernatural. [PAWN_pronoun] can synthesize complex drugs with remarkable efficiency, turning raw materials into potent pharmaceuticals.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_Botanist_0.Name: Botanist
SN_Botanist_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] speaks the language of plants fluently. [PAWN_pronoun]'s deep understanding of botany allows [PAWN_pronoun] to coax the best yields from any crop and identify valuable plants in the wild.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_Rancher_0.Name: Rancher
SN_Rancher_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a natural affinity for animals and agriculture. [PAWN_pronoun]'s gentle touch with livestock and deep understanding of farming makes [PAWN_pronoun] an invaluable asset to any settlement.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_Artisan_0.Name: Artisan
SN_Artisan_0.Description:
[PAWN_name]'s hands seem guided by an innate sense of craftsmanship. [PAWN_pronoun] can transform raw materials into works of art with remarkable skill and precision.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_fieldmedic_0.Name: Field medic
SN_fieldmedic_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] thrives in the chaos of emergency situations. [PAWN_pronoun] prioritizes speed over perfection, saving lives with quick, decisive action rather than painstaking precision.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_smith_0.Name: Smith
SN_smith_0.Description:
[PAWN_name]'s mastery of metalworking is evident in every piece [PAWN_pronoun] creates. [PAWN_pronoun] can transform raw metal into tools and weapons with remarkable efficiency.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_socialworker_0.Name: Social worker
SN_socialworker_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a natural talent for diplomacy and negotiation. [PAWN_pronoun] can read people like an open book and always seems to find the right words to get what [PAWN_pronoun] wants.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_naturalgenius_0.Name: Natural genius
SN_naturalgenius_0.Description:
[PAWN_name]'s brilliant mind comes at a cost. [PAWN_pronoun] learns at an astonishing rate but struggles with mental stability, [PAWN_possessive] extraordinary intellect walking hand in hand with emotional volatility.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_wise_0.Name: Wise
SN_wise_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] possesses a rare combination of intelligence and emotional stability. [PAWN_pronoun] approaches challenges with a clear mind and steady hand, making [PAWN_pronoun] an invaluable advisor and researcher.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_peasant_0.Name: Peasant
SN_peasant_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has mastered the art of being unremarkable. [PAWN_pronoun] moves through life unnoticed, [PAWN_possessive] unassuming nature often working to [PAWN_possessive] advantage in negotiations and social situations.
(Synergistic Traits)

SN_ResourcefulHauler_0.Name: Backpacker
SN_ResourcefulHauler_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is skilled at packing and carrying goods. [PAWN_pronoun] can shoulder heavier loads than most and has a knack for finding extra sustenance when foraging, making [PAWN_pronoun] a highly efficient transporter.
(Synergistic Traits)

VME_Elder_0.Name: Elder
VME_Elder_0.Description:
Either the body or mind of {PAWN_nameDef} is one of insight and experience. While some find them old fashioned, others will respect their guidance.
(Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures)
VME_Elder_0.ModSource: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures

VQE_IdealPatient_0.Name: Ideal patient
VQE_IdealPatient_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef}'s body accepts archite alterations with unnatural ease. {PAWN_pronoun} will never suffer rejections during the injection process.
(Vanilla Quests Expanded - Ancients)

VRE_Flirty_0.Name: Flirty
VRE_Flirty_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is always ready with a flirtatious comment or a playful compliment, lifting the spirits of those around {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} has a knack for making others feel special and desired, however this may sometimes lead to complicated situations when {PAWN_possessive} playful intentions are misinterpreted.
(Vanilla Races Expanded - Highmate)

VRE_Distressed_0.Name: Distressed
VRE_Distressed_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is exceptionally empathetic and sensitive to the suffering of others. Whenever {PAWN_pronoun} witnesses pain or hardship, it deeply affects {PAWN_objective}, resulting in memories of these events haunting {PAWN_nameDef} for a much longer time.
(Vanilla Races Expanded - Highmate)

VTE_AbsentMinded_0.Name: Absent-minded
VTE_AbsentMinded_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} tends to let {PAWN_possessive} mind drift, even in the middle of work. {PAWN_pronoun} may sometimes stop tasks at random.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Eccentric_0.Name: Eccentric
VTE_Eccentric_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has a screw loose, but it comes with a sharper scientific mind.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Perfectionist_0.Name: Perfectionist
VTE_Perfectionist_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} strives for perfection in {PAWN_possessive} work. {PAWN_pronoun} produces higher-quality products, but works more slowly. Failing to meet {PAWN_possessive} standards causes unhappiness, and on rare occasions {PAWN_pronoun} may abandon a project mid-way.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Coward_0.Name: Coward
VTE_Coward_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef}'s instincts lean heavily toward cowardice. In danger, {PAWN_pronoun} will often hide or run before standing to fight.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Brave_0.Name: Brave
VTE_Brave_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has stronger mental and physical fortitude than most. {PAWN_pronoun} can endure pain more readily, and is slower to break under harsh conditions.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Clumsy_0.Name: Clumsy
VTE_Clumsy_0.Description:
Minor bruises and scrapes plague {PAWN_nameDef}, usually from tripping or falling due to poor coordination.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_HeatInclined_0.Name: Heat inclined
VTE_HeatInclined_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the heat of a dry summer day. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in warmth.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_ColdInclined_0.Name: Cold inclined
VTE_ColdInclined_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the chill of a brisk winter night. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind shivering or sleeping in the cold.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_HeavySleeper_0.Name: Heavy sleeper
VTE_HeavySleeper_0.Description:
A bomb could go off beside {PAWN_nameDef} while {PAWN_pronoun} sleeps, and {PAWN_pronoun} would keep right on sleeping. {PAWN_pronoun} can't be bothered to work or defend the colony mid-nap.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Neat_0.Name: Neat
VTE_Neat_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is naturally hygienic and organized. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't track dirt or scatter trash, and enjoys cleaning.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Slob_0.Name: Slob
VTE_Slob_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is naturally sloppy, leaving trash and dirt scattered around. At least {PAWN_pronoun} isn't much bothered by messy surroundings.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Workaholic_0.Name: Workaholic
VTE_Workaholic_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} struggles to take breaks or rest mid-job. {PAWN_pronoun} will keep working, even at the expense of {PAWN_possessive} health or sleep.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_IronStomach_0.Name: Iron stomach
VTE_IronStomach_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has never known nausea. Food poisoning and vomiting are foreign to {PAWN_objective}.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_AnimalLover_0.Name: Animal lover
VTE_AnimalLover_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} can't stand cruelty toward animals. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier when nuzzled or acting as master to a tamed animal, but is more deeply upset when losing one. {PAWN_pronoun} also refuses to butcher animals.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_AnimalHater_0.Name: Animal hater
VTE_AnimalHater_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} believes in human superiority over animals. {PAWN_pronoun} dislikes bonding or being nuzzled, but feels satisfaction when animals die or are sold.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_BigBoned_0.Name: Big-boned
VTE_BigBoned_0.Description:
Whether from bulk or awkward posture, {PAWN_nameDef} has broken a few chairs in {PAWN_possessive} time, and is likely to break more.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Rebel_0.Name: Rebel
VTE_Rebel_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} only plays by {PAWN_possessive} own rules. When forced, {PAWN_pronoun} will drag {PAWN_possessive} feet and work more slowly.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Submissive_0.Name: Submissive
VTE_Submissive_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} needs clear direction on when and how to act. {PAWN_pronoun} works at normal speed only when ordered, and otherwise slows down.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Vengeful_0.Name: Vengeful
VTE_Vengeful_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is fueled by spite. {PAWN_pronoun} can’t stand sharing the colony with rivals, and feels happier when one of them dies.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Technophobe_0.Name: Technophobe
VTE_Technophobe_0.Description:
Whether from trauma or fear of change, {PAWN_nameDef} rejects modernity. {PAWN_pronoun} may lash out at machines, refuses to research, and feels satisfaction from destroying mechanoids.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_FunLoving_0.Name: Fun-loving
VTE_FunLoving_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} lives for a good time. {PAWN_pronoun} remembers parties fondly, and the joy lasts far longer than it does for most.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Dunce_0.Name: Dunce
VTE_Dunce_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has limited mental capacity. {PAWN_pronoun} learns slowly and struggles with conversation, but tends to be naturally happy.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_MartialArtist_0.Name: Martial artist
VTE_MartialArtist_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has trained in melee combat and learned a special move to disarm opponents.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Snob_0.Name: Snob
VTE_Snob_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Squeamish_0.Name: Squeamish
VTE_Squeamish_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} gets a sour stomach around blood or corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for {PAWN_objective}.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Anxious_0.Name: Anxious
VTE_Anxious_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is naturally anxious, especially in social situations. {PAWN_pronoun} avoids gatherings and sometimes retreats to {PAWN_possessive} room to cope.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Insatiable_0.Name: Insatiable
VTE_Insatiable_0.Description:
No amount of lovin’ is ever enough for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} tends to move between partners and seeks intimacy often.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Prude_0.Name: Prude
VTE_Prude_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} gives {PAWN_possessive} body only to a spouse and would never initiate divorce. {PAWN_pronoun} also dislikes nudity more than most.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_CouchPotato_0.Name: Couch potato
VTE_CouchPotato_0.Description:
An armchair and a screen are all {PAWN_nameDef} needs to be happy. {PAWN_pronoun} never tires of watching television, and always feels good after.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_CatPerson_0.Name: Cat person
VTE_CatPerson_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the company of cats and gravitates toward bonding with them, but dislikes dogs.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_DogPerson_0.Name: Dog person
VTE_DogPerson_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the company of dogs and gravitates toward bonding with them, but dislikes cats.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Prodigy_0.Name: Prodigy
VTE_Prodigy_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has a sharp, logical mind. {PAWN_pronoun} researches faster than most, and {PAWN_possessive} rational outlook makes {PAWN_objective} less prone to mental breaks.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Menagerist_0.Name: Menagerist
VTE_Menagerist_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} believes animals are essential to life and society. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier with more of them around, and is especially skilled at taming and training.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_ChildOfSea_0.Name: Ocean lover
VTE_ChildOfSea_0.Description:
The sea calls to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier when near the ocean or a deep river.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_ChildOfMountain_0.Name: Mountain lover
VTE_ChildOfMountain_0.Description:
The mountains call to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} feels happier when near a large mountain.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_MadSurgeon_0.Name: Mad surgeon
VTE_MadSurgeon_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} hides a twisted obsession. {PAWN_pronoun} treats organ harvesting as a dark experiment and takes pleasure in it. Harvesting makes {PAWN_objective} happy, but going too long without fuels growing unrest.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_DrunkenMaster_0.Name: Drunken master
VTE_DrunkenMaster_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} fights best when drunk. {PAWN_pronoun} grows more dangerous in melee the more intoxicated {PAWN_pronoun} becomes.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Kleptomaniac_0.Name: Kleptomaniac
VTE_Kleptomaniac_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is compelled to steal, even from guests and allies, risking angering others.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Stoner_0.Name: Stoner
VTE_Stoner_0.Description:
Smokeleaf is a way of life for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} adores it and would rather die than give it up.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Lush_0.Name: Lush
VTE_Lush_0.Description:
Alcohol is a way of life for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} adores drinking and would rather die than give it up.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Wanderlust_0.Name: Wanderlust
VTE_Wanderlust_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} loves to travel and feels happiest on the move. {PAWN_pronoun} grows restless when staying too long in one place, but moves quickly and forages well while caravanning.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Insomniac_0.Name: Insomniac
VTE_Insomniac_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is never fully asleep or awake. {PAWN_pronoun} lurches along in a slow, shambler-like state, and only sleeps once every few days.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_WorldWeary_0.Name: World weary
VTE_WorldWeary_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has grown tired of the world. {PAWN_pronoun} struggles with bleak thoughts, making {PAWN_possessive} personality difficult to befriend.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Desensitized_0.Name: Desensitized
VTE_Desensitized_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is hardened by old emotional trauma. {PAWN_pronoun} feels nothing from death or loss, whether animal, colonist, family, or prisoner.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_RefinedPalate_0.Name: Refined palate
VTE_RefinedPalate_0.Description:
Only the finest meals satisfy {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} feels indifferent toward ordinary food, but savors lavish meals and gains greater joy from them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Academian_0.Name: Academian
VTE_Academian_0.Description:
Through scholastic pursuit, {PAWN_nameDef} has become well-read. {PAWN_pronoun} excels in science and medicine, and tends patients with greater skill.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Groundbreaker_0.Name: Groundbreaker
VTE_Groundbreaker_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} believes infrastructure is everything. {PAWN_pronoun} is a natural builder and stoneworker, constructing and mining with greater speed and efficiency.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Gastronomist_0.Name: Gastronomist
VTE_Gastronomist_0.Description:
To {PAWN_nameDef}, food is art. {PAWN_pronoun} creates beautiful, delicious meals that are almost always safe to eat.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Ecologist_0.Name: Ecologist
VTE_Ecologist_0.Description:
Flora and fauna are vital to {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} uses every part of plants and animals, and appreciates nature’s gifts.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Tycoon_0.Name: Tycoon
VTE_Tycoon_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} has an eye for silver and a silver tongue to match. {PAWN_pronoun} values {PAWN_possessive} own goods highly, and convinces others to do the same.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_ThickSkinned_0.Name: Thick skinned
VTE_ThickSkinned_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_ThinSkinned_0.Name: Thin skinned
VTE_ThinSkinned_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

VTE_Schizoid_0.Name: Schizoid
VTE_Schizoid_0.Description:
{PAWN_nameDef} bottles up {PAWN_possessive} feelings for long stretches of time. When the pressure grows too great, {PAWN_pronoun} may suddenly break down.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

RCT_Aesthete_0.Name: Aesthete
RCT_Aesthete_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] loves beautiful things, and really cares about how [PAWN_possessive] enviroment looks.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_AnimalLover_0.Name: Animal lover
RCT_AnimalLover_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] loves animals. [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't feel quite the same about people, though.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_AnimalHater_0.Name: Animal hater
RCT_AnimalHater_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] just isn't an "animal person." [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't like animals, and for the record, they don't seem to much like [PAWN_objective], either.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Builder_0.Name: Builder
RCT_Builder_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] loved playing with construction toys as a child, and still enjoys the thrill of "putting things together." But [PAWN_pronoun] tends to be a bit lost without clear instructions to follow.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Butcher_0.Name: Butcher
RCT_Butcher_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] enjoys preparing meat for cooking. [PAWN_possessive] butchering speed is greatly increased, but only if [PAWN_pronoun]'s dealing with animal corpses. [PAWN_pronoun]'s terrible with mechanoids.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Claustrophobic_0.Name: Claustrophobic
RCT_Claustrophobic_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is claustrophobic. [PAWN_pronoun] is terrified of tight spaces, and thus is not a very competent miner.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_ColdLover_0.Name: Cold lover
RCT_ColdLover_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] loves colder temperatures. [PAWN_pronoun]'ll complain less than others when it's chilly, but will whine more when it's hot.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_DeepSleeper_0.Name: Deep sleeper
RCT_DeepSleeper_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] can sleep through anything.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Dunce_0.Name: Dunce
RCT_Dunce_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a bit of a dunce, and learns at a slower rate than others.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Gourmet_0.Name: Gourmet
RCT_Gourmet_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a passion for food preparation. [PAWN_possessive] culinary creations are quite tasty, but [PAWN_pronoun] tends to take a while getting them "just right."
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_HeatLover_0.Name: Heat lover
RCT_HeatLover_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] loves the heat. [PAWN_pronoun]'ll complain less than others when it's hot, but will whine more when it's cold.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Aptitude_-1.Name: Inept
RCT_Aptitude_-1.Description:
[PAWN_pronoun] means well, but [PAWN_name] is uncoordinated, and just not very good at any sort of skilled labor.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Aptitude_1.Name: Coordinated
RCT_Aptitude_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] is unusually coordinated, and good at most any sort of skilled labor.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_PainThreshold_2.Name: Unstoppable
RCT_PainThreshold_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] has an exceptionally high tolerance for pain. [PAWN_pronoun] is unlikely to be immobilized by it.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_PainThreshold_1.Name: Ironman
RCT_PainThreshold_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a high tolerance for pain.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_PainThreshold_-1.Name: Low pain tolerance
RCT_PainThreshold_-1.Description:
[PAWN_name] will become immobilized by pain more quickly than most.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Inventor_0.Name: Inventor
RCT_Inventor_0.Description:
Strange new ideas just appear in [PAWN_name]'s mind. Researching new technologies comes easily to [PAWN_objective], but [PAWN_pronoun] always seems distracted.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Eyesight_-1.Name: Cranial nerve palsy
RCT_Eyesight_-1.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a hard time seeing things clearly unless they are right in front of them.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Eyesight_1.Name: Eagle-eyed
RCT_Eyesight_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a keen eye, and can quickly spot targets.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_NeatFreak_0.Name: Neat freak
RCT_NeatFreak_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is fastidious to a fault.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_EatingSpeed_-1.Name: Nibbler
RCT_EatingSpeed_-1.Description:
[PAWN_name] picks at [PAWN_possessive] food, taking extra time to finish [PAWN_possessive] meals.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_EatingSpeed_1.Name: Glutton
RCT_EatingSpeed_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] devours [PAWN_possessive] meals much faster than others.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Nyctophobe_-1.Name: Nyctophobe
RCT_Nyctophobe_-1.Description:
[PAWN_name] is really afraid of the dark.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Nyctophobe_1.Name: Nyctophile
RCT_Nyctophobe_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] doesn't fear the dark at all.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Perfectionist_0.Name: Perfectionist
RCT_Perfectionist_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] refuses to accept less than [PAWN_possessive] best in any endeavor, no matter how long it takes. [PAWN_pronoun]'s less likely to fail when doing something, but [PAWN_pronoun] works slowly.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Medic_-1.Name: Poor medic
RCT_Medic_-1.Description:
Even when they have the best of intentions, some people just aren't cut out for medicine. [PAWN_name] is one of those people.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Medic_1.Name: Skilled medic
RCT_Medic_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] seems to have a knack for medical work. Patients in [PAWN_possessive] care will likely fare well.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Medic_2.Name: Master medic
RCT_Medic_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] has a natural aptitude for medical work. Between [PAWN_possessive] steady, skilled hands and [PAWN_possessive] inspiring bedside manner, patients in [PAWN_possessive] care will have little to fear.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Rockhound_0.Name: Rockhound
RCT_Rockhound_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] enjoys working with rocks. [PAWN_possessive] mining speed is increased, but [PAWN_possessive] lack of interest in other areas slows [PAWN_objective] down when doing other jobs. And [PAWN_pronoun] hates working with plants.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Savant_0.Name: Savant
RCT_Savant_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a modern-day Da Vinci, with a creative mind that can grasp new ideas almost effortlessly. But [PAWN_pronoun]'s almost painfully slow when it comes to doing actual physical work.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_decentlearner_0.Name: Decent learner
RCT_decentlearner_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] has always picked up skills pretty quickly.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Trader_-1.Name: Sucker
RCT_Trader_-1.Description:
[PAWN_name] just can't seem to help but get taken advantage of while trading. [PAWN_pronoun]'ll pay more than [PAWN_pronoun] should, and still think that [PAWN_pronoun] got a good deal. 
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Trader_1.Name: Haggler
RCT_Trader_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] likes to haggle, and isn't bad at it. [PAWN_pronoun] tends to get better prices than most people.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Trader_2.Name: Master trader
RCT_Trader_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] always gets the best deals.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

ShootingAccuracy_1.Name: Careful shooter
ShootingAccuracy_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] takes more time to aim when shooting. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

ShootingAccuracy_-1.Name: Trigger-happy
ShootingAccuracy_-1.Description:
Pew! Pew! Pew! [PAWN_name] just likes pulling the trigger. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

ShootingAccuracy_2.Name: Deadshot
ShootingAccuracy_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] knows how to handle a firearm, and can shoot both quickly and accurately.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Diplomat_-1.Name: Uncouth
RCT_Diplomat_-1.Description:
Subtlety? Diplomacy? [PAWN_name] barely even understands the meaning of the words.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Diplomat_1.Name: Diplomat
RCT_Diplomat_1.Description:
[PAWN_name] knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Diplomat_2.Name: Master diplomat
RCT_Diplomat_2.Description:
[PAWN_name] has such a way with words that [PAWN_pronoun] always manages to cool down a tense situation. [PAWN_pronoun] could talk for days and people would still listen.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Constitution_-1.Name: Weak constitution
RCT_Constitution_-1.Description:
[PAWN_name] is especially vulnerable to diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_Constitution_1.Name: Strong constitution
RCT_Constitution_1.Description:
[PAWN_name]'s body is stronger than normal against diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_BrownThumb_0.Name: Brown thumb
RCT_BrownThumb_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a terrible gardener. The only thing [PAWN_pronoun] seems able to grow is weeds.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)

RCT_GreenThumb_0.Name: Green thumb
RCT_GreenThumb_0.Description:
[PAWN_name] is a great gardener. The only thing [PAWN_pronoun] wants is a greener world.
((LC) Consolidated Traits)
